name: xo
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.1.12" %}
# obtained sha256 with "shasum -a -b" command
{% set sha256 = "3ae8a8c676b814425b115423d559875e421446a65d7a52fbd84dce8c2bff919f" %}

package:
  name: xo
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: xo-{{ sha256 }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/scopatz/xo/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win or py2k]
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - urwid >=1.1.1
    - pygments >=1.6

test:
  commands:
    - xo --help

about:
  home: http://exofrills.org/
  license: WTFPL v2
  summary: "exofrills text editor"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - scopatz
